title: Estimated U.S. retail per capita sales from 2000 to 2017
yAxis: Per capita sales in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Per capita sales in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Per capita sales in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Per capita sales in U.S. dollars, of value 15522.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Per capita sales in U.S. dollars, of value 10573.0 was reported at Year 2000
